Text: Why can't you put the subs in a seperate file... that way french people can watch the subs along with the video in FLV-player and the rest of the world doesn't have to bother with the French subs. But thanks for the upload though.
Jeah what NilsNL said, its really annoying especially since it hinders the reading of the english texts (and on top of that beeing inaccurate translations)
